mapper.select: SELECT DATE(payment_date) as 'date' , count(payment_date) as 'count' , sum(payment_price) as 'price' , sum(payment_delivery_price) as 'delivery' , sum(payment_sum_price) as 'priceSum' , sum(payment_coupon_price) as 'priceCoupon' , sum(payment_point_price) as 'pricePoint' , sum(payment_sail_price) as 'priceSail' , sum(payment_final_price) as 'priceFinal' FROM payment_info WHERE DATE(payment_date) >= STR_TO_DATE('2022-03-23', '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY date LIMIT 0,7;
